Description: Clay tablet; fragment; court case at Dimat-Enlil involving a man, his wife and a third person; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.230)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
